entry.title: Scarlet
entry.summary:
Author: warisa_racket

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,917Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 37

Summary: ‚ù£ exlover!JasonTodd x F!reader‚ù£ 20th century anachronistic neonoir au; exes to lovers; no superheroes in this one, just a morally grey underworld criminal Jason Todd‚ù£ Summary: You‚Äôre a law student moonlighting as a jazz club singer to make ends meet. Between balancing your studies and side-gig, you‚Äôve willed yourself into believing that you‚Äôre over him, that you‚Äôre strong enough to detach yourself from him despite his efforts to nudge his way back into your life. Suddenly, you see him everywhere, and your life derails again as you fight to keep both you and Jason afloat.Exhausted and withdrawn, Jason has spent the last year trying to piece himself back together after your breakup. Enticed by numbness and increasingly reckless in his behavior, Jason let himself be pulled in too many different directions, the distractions and bustle of life demanding that he focus on anything but your absence. At his breaking point, he shows up to your job, just for a glimpse of you, to hear your voice lulling him into a false sense of hope that maybe he can remind you that he‚Äôs yours.

entry.title: Kiss the Blade, Bear the Bullet
entry.summary:
Author: MiyuKazu

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,694Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Gotham doesn‚Äôt raise heroes. It forges weapons. Broken ones. Beautiful ones. The kind that don‚Äôt realize they‚Äôre bleeding until they‚Äôre already drowning.Jason Todd is one of them.She is not.She wasn‚Äôt raised in Gotham. She was raised in silence. In shadow.With discipline for lullabies, and blades for toys.‚ÄúYou are the child of a Ghost and an Angel, do you understand?‚Äù Her father asks. She doesn‚Äôt understand, but she nods regardless.‚ÄúYour title is Nephilim.‚Äù He says. His large hand cups her face, tilting her chin up to look at him. ‚ÄúYour true name and face are privileges that few people on this planet will ever have the opportunity to know.‚ÄùHer father‚Äôs legacy is a noose‚Äî tightening since the day she was born.Two weapons; broken and reforged. One carved from fire and tragedy, the other shaped in silence and purpose. Their stories are not parallel. They are tangled. Twisted.Fated.

entry.title: Devoted Little Thing
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,549Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 496

Summary: After the death of your boyfriend, Jason Todd, your life has never been the same. You abandon everything you've ever known: your job working for Batman as a detective, your home, your friends. That is until three years after his death, your life is saved by a mysterious vigilante calling himself the Red Hood.You assume it was a one-off; that the infamous anti-hero just happened to be in the right place at the right time. But you're finding his calling card everywhere. He's around every single corner‚Äïyou can't seem to get rid of him. The mystery of his identity brings you back to Bruce in hopes of finding out who he is. But as intimidating as the Red Hood is, with his blurry morals and all, you can't help but find yourself falling for him. Maybe he's the answer to your loneliness.
